gradeLevel: Grade: 8, Unit 6: Associations in Data, Lesson 8: Analyzing Bivariate Data
lessonGoal: Students use everything they have studied in the unit so far to analyze and interpret bivariate data in context (MP2). They add points to a scatter plot, identify outliers, and fit a line. They also compare actual and predicted values and reflect on what they've learned about modeling bivariate data.
